name: Quur
description:
Violence is not always your best option

In a world sustained by a magical liquid, called the Color, you embody an ethereal being capable of manipulating it.

Every action you take will have a direct impact on the forest of Quur and on the creatures who inhabit it.


______________________

Quur is a student game made at Supinfogame RUBIKA (France) during the 2015-2016 school year.

▶ More information on our website

The game is playable on Windows only. For a better experience, we recommend the use of a gamepad, but Quur can also be played with a keyboard.


KEYBOARD CONTROLS:
WASD or ZQSD to Move
SPACE to Jump
Left Click for Fast Attacks
Right Click for Heavy Attacks
Q or A for Projectile
E for Intimidation
SHIFT to Dodge
